kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: ${output} = 2019-08-24 03:22:50 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-24 03:22:50 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-08-24 03:22:50 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-24 03:22:50 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019-08-24 03:22:50 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:191 - XceiverClientMetrics metrics system started 2019-08-24 03:22:51 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-1C0FFBD01E50->f1d55567-ff26-4bbb-9391-0d0eafb17664: receive RaftClientReply:client-1C0FFBD01E50->f1d55567-ff26-4bbb-9391-0d0eafb17664@group-FFF68E8DA820, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=1, commits[f1d55567-ff26-4bbb-9391-0d0eafb17664:c1] 2019-08-24 03:22:52 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-1C0FFBD01E50->f1d55567-ff26-4bbb-9391-0d0eafb17664: receive RaftClientReply:client-1C0FFBD01E50->f1d55567-ff26-4bbb-9391-0d0eafb17664@group-FFF68E8DA820, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=3, commits[f1d55567-ff26-4bbb-9391-0d0eafb17664:c4]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.msg: ${result} = Found 3 items -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 1159555 2019-08-24 03:22 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/key1 -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 14978 1970-03-13 01:18 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/ozone-53057 drwxrwxrwx - ...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
